title: Puneeth
content:
First I had a problem with activating MS Office 2021. I called Lenovo support. They could not fix it and asked me to contact Microsoft support which I could never reach.

Second, after couple of days the microphone stopped working. That's when I requested for replacement. Since they are out of stock for this model, they are refunding the money.

title: Amazon Customer
content: Well, this could have been a great deal if the display was a touch better. No complaints otherwise. For the price you are getting a very good processor, memory and storage - 512SSD (Dell doesn't offer this with their i311. Toshiba does have it, but their processor is inferior). Overall, this is the best laptop you can get for the price, if you are not too picky on the display. The display is decent for most home use, but you can see the flaw for example when attending a Teams meeting with a high quality image displayed.

title: Vineet
content: Is a good looking laptop that I purchased for my college-going kid. Has quick start-up and shut-down, thanks to the SSD. Comes with Windows 10 and MS Office. Good anti-glare screen and camera. Absolutely no complaints. Thank you Lenovo and Amazon.

title: Abhishek Ajit Bhingarde
content: Nice at this price tag .... Laptop is Excellent and the texture of its body looks amazing.... Build quality is nice ..... Hardware and softwares work Amazingly hand in hand ... Just one problem : screen shakes if a slight push is applied to the table on which the laptop is placed. Otherwise a perfect buy for engineers and other students !

title: Amazon Customer
content: Its been just 2 months since I purchased the laptop and the battery backup is terrible. It takes 3.5 hrs to fully charge and drains out in just 2 hrs. Its slow and pathetic. Very disappointed with this Lenovo product. Do not but this product.

Design looks premium very less bezels. Can go for it.

title: Mani
content:
Fantastic product with in this price range.

This is my first laptop so I have gone through many reviews and research since 3 months to get a product so that I would not regret for my first laptop. Yes I am completely satisfied with the product.

Highlights on pros.

1. Awesome display and elegant body.
2. Backlit with in this price is awesome.
3. SSD that too 512 SSD with in this range is mesmerizing.
4. 8GB Ram and 512 GB ROM in SSD, trust me one of the option made me to choose this.
5. 65W charger with fast charging speed. Laptop is getting charged within 80 minutes.
6. No heating issues I have found yet after using 6 days.
7. Decent enough camera with shutter(attractive feature).

Cons.

None I have found yet
